item.title: My Year in Reviewâ€¦
item.description: Doing the Year In Review thing, where you take the first sentence from the first entry you post each month… I start the year out by getting dumped and finish it by getting smacked in the face by a prawn. In the middle, there are witches and princesses and bugger. But it’s really boring. January: Single again. I was going to say alone again, but i think i was alone before anyway.
